description: Runs a DataSync discovery job on your on-premises storage system. If you haven't added the storage system to DataSync Discovery yet, do this first by using the AddStorageSystem operation.

parameters.name: StorageSystemArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the on-premises storage system that you want to run the discovery job on.

parameters.name: CollectionDurationMinutes
parameters.description: Specifies in minutes how long you want the discovery job to run.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Specifies a client token to make sure requests with this API operation are idempotent. If you don't specify a client token, DataSync generates one for you automatically. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Specifies labels that help you categorize, filter, and search for your Amazon Web Services resources. (dict) --- A key-value pair representing a single tag that's been applied to an Amazon Web Services resource. The key for an Amazon Web Services resource tag. Value (string) --- The value for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

nested_items.name: DiscoveryJobArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the discovery job that you started.
